channel.title: Skill Capes - Help Please
channel.description: I'm trying to add skill capes to a shop in my 317/delta server. When adding the ID's to the shops using the ids from both (9747-9811) and (14073-14140) they both turn out as nulls. I understand that 317 is the oldest type of RS, but is there anyway to add them onto it?

item.title: Skill Capes - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I’m trying to add skill capes to a shop in my 317/delta server. When adding the ID’s to the shops using the ids from both (9747-9811) and (14073-14140) they both turn out as nulls. I understand that 317 is the oldest type of RS, but is there anyway to add them onto it?

Read full topic
